application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application permits the partial discharge of Condition 11 (Canal Wall Works) as attached to planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2021/751 for Phase 1c (Block F2 and Block F3/F4) only.

1) The applicant/developer is advised that the works will require the separate technical approval of the Trust and need to comply with the Canal & River Trust "Code of Practice for Works affecting the Canal & River Trust", and if approved a temporary works licence will be required with the applicant /developer being liable for associated commercial and legal fees. Please contact Bernadette McNicholas in the Trust's Estates Team (Bernadette.mcnicholas@canalrivertrust.org.uk) and Des Harris, Trust's Works Engineering Team (desmond.harris@canalrivertrust.org.uk) on these matters to ensure that any necessary consents and licences are obtained.

2) Any mooring would require the separate agreement of the Trust via the submission of an operating proposal. More details can be found via the Trust's website: Business boating | Canal & River Trust (canalrivertrust.org.uk)
3) Details of surface water discharge from the site to the Grand Union Canal during operation of the site have previously bee
site_name: Block F2 and Block F3/F4, Former Nestle Factory
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 11 (Canal Wall Works - Phase 1c (Block F2 and Block F3/F4) as attached to planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2021/751 dated 10-11-2021 (Section 73 application seeking a variation to Condition 61 (Approved Drawings) of planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2019/1666 dated 11-09-20 (Section 73 application to vary Condition 9 (Residential Condition - Approved Plans) of planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2017/1883 dated 28/06/2018 (Part demolition of existing factory buildings and associated structures, and redevelopment to provide residential dwellings (Use Class C3), office, retail, community and leisure uses (Use Class A1/A3/A4/B1/B8/D1/D2), commercial floorspace (Use Classes B1c/B2/B8) and Data Centre (Sui Generis), amenity and playspace, landscaping, allotments, access, service yards, associated car parking and other engineering works) (as amended by application ref: 1331/APP/2020/50 dated 06/02/20)).
